pkgmetadata.longdescription: Easier Interaction with the Ordnance Survey Data Hub // Ordnance Survey ('OS') is the national mapping agency for Great Britain and produces a large variety of mapping and geospatial products. Much of OS's data is available via the OS Data Hub https://osdatahub.os.uk/, a platform that hosts both free and premium data products. 'osdatahub' provides a user-friendly way to access, query, and download these data.
